response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features that promise to deliver unparalleled performance and convenience. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose a price of $150 for this product. I trust that this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, durability, and satisfaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 150}
